opinion:
542 U.S. 936

MILLER-EL
v.
DRETKE, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted. Reported below: 361 F. 3d 849.
